channel.title: Amazing idea I found on steam (Melusca's idea not mine)
channel.description:
Okay so I heard this amazing and simple idea on steam and I just love it so much I had to put it here, btw I did not make this idea a person did called Melusca
He/She said this on the steam post
Noble's Maid Spy should color-code whispers from chosen player
As it is now it's pretty hard to distinguish whispers from players you're spying from the rest. Particularly when there's a burst of them like everyone claiming to the King.
Again this is not my idea it is Melusca's idea
